column4: hi together.. just wanted some help with fluxbox transparency and feh..
- i cannot run the render on thing
are you using fluxbox from the repositories?
ok, well did you install feh?
ok well did you set the background with fbsetbg?
- yes, i have it.. and i think something from gnome WM /also installed/ makes my term to get also transparent.. but in menus, slit, toolbar, and windows nothin..

I just realized I compiled fluxbox... so I'm not sure if the one in the repos was compiled with support for that or not.  Basically on mine all I had to do was install feh, use feh with fbsetbg -f file, and then restart fluxbox, then I could control transparency
pastebin what fluxbox -i gives you, maybe we can do some quick research and figure it out
actually, just tell tell me what this says: fluxbox -i | grep RENDER
yeah, I believe you would have to compile your own if you wanted it
